creator: hirose31@t3.rim.or.jp
text:
when Options +Indexes, icon of directory that includes DirectoryIndex files 
(ex: index.html, index.htm) is not a folder.gif.

for example;

DirectoryIndex index.html index.htm
AddIcon /icons/layout.gif .html .shtml .htm .pdf
AddIcon /icons/folder.gif ^^DIRECTORY^^

and following directory/file layout,

DocumentRoot/ai/dir1/hoge.htm
                dir2/index.htm

access to http://HOST/ai/, I see following in browser.

  Parent Directory
  [folder.gif] dir1/
  [layout.gif] dir2/

icon of dir2 is not folder.gif but layout.gif.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9587 ***
creator: nd@perlig.de
